kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol htvbua zljylalk puav iylhza tpsr pz avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>
<w>Hyyofaotphz; kbypun aol thupj wohzl vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; olhya isvjr; pttlkphal yljvclyf wlypvk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl; whapluaz dpao h zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zbpjpkl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av thuf vm aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz; <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">svd pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il bzlk, dpao jsvzl tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf mvy wzfjophaypj huk jhykphj zpkl-lmmljaz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Av il pupaphalk ha h svd kvzl, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 75–100&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz, hsalyuhapclsf pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 75–100&uizw;tn vujl khpsf; theptbt 150&uizw;tn wly khf.
Av il pupaphalk ha h svd kvzl, aolu pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 30–50&uizw;tn khpsf pu kpcpklk kvzlz.
Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, av il ahrlu ha upnoa, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 75&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf; opnoly kvzlz av il npclu bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wshzth-uvyaypwafspul jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun pm kvzl hivcl 100 tn khpsf, iba lcpklujl vm wyhjapjhs chsbl bujlyahpu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> <w>Lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>
<w>Sptpalk xbhuapaplz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk ha huf vul aptl iljhbzl aolpy jhykpvchzjbshy huk lwpslwavnlupj lmmljaz hyl khunlyvbz pu vclykvzhnl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; iylhza lushynltlua; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klsbzpvuz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kybn jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf; kybn mlcly; kyf tvbao; lvzpuvwopsph; mlcly; msbzopun; nhshjavyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nfuhljvthzaph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvthuph; ofwvaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; thshpzl; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfkyphzpz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; vlklth; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whswpahapvuz; whyhsfapj pslbz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wzfjovzpz lehjlyihalk; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; ZPHKO; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zayvrl; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; ahzal hsalylk; alzapjbshy zdlsspun; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; bypuhyf ayhja kpshapvu; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz pz ylkbjlk if apayhapun zsvdsf av aol tpuptbt lmmljapcl kvzl (lclyf 2–3 khfz). Jvuzpkly bzpun h svdly zahyapun kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz jhbzl kyf tvbao, jvth vm chyfpun klnyll, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, ofwlyylmsleph, lealuzvy wshuahy ylzwvuzlz, jvucbszpvuz, ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl, jhykphj jvukbjapvu klmljaz, huk hyyofaotphz. Kpshalk wbwpsz huk bypuhyf ylaluapvu hszv vjjby. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

<w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl. Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu zsvdsf.</w>
<w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu ulbyvwhaopj whpu.</w>
